summary: A test suite that verifies the behavior of an email backend implementation, providing setup and teardown utilities and exercising features such as plain and HTML message sending, handling of admin and manager recipients, Unicode and internationalized domain names, lazy address resolution, long line handling, bulk sending, context manager usage, and proper connection closure.
business_intent: Validate and guarantee the correctness and robustness of the email sending component within the application, ensuring reliable delivery and compliance with expected email formatting and recipient handling.
